mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_chat(chat_room_id, user_id, context, view_at,created_at) values (#{chatRoomId},#{userId},#{context},#{viewAt},now());
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_chat SET context = #{context}, view_at = #{viewAt} WHERE chat_id = #{chatId};
mapper.select: SELECT a.chat_room_id, a.user_id as sendUserId, c.username as sendUsername, a.context as message FROM tb_chat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT start_at FROM tb_chat_room_user WHERE chat_room_id = ${chatRoomId} AND user_id = ${userId}) as b ON a.created_at >= b.start_at LEFT JOIN tb_user c ON a.user_id = c.user_id WHERE a.chat_room_id = ${chatRoomId} AND a.created_at >= b.start_at
